name: The Gift (itch) (Cosmic Works Studios)
description:
Sometimes we put our efforts on giving gifts to our families and friends, but we forgot to giive something to ourselves. This game is for you, yes, yes, it's for you. Giftis is a solitary gift that is looking for its owner. Help it to find you. Who knows!? Maybe it is the best you can have.

Controls:

Left and Right arrows - Move left and right.
Up arrow - Speed up to go faster and faster.
Down arrow - Slow down
Space- Jump
Escape - Restart

Enjoy your gift!
